attributes.action: Require schools to start at 10:00 AM
attributes.additional_details:
Studies show that students learn more / better if they have a greater amount of sleep, meaning learning would be more efficient.

Example: https://drcraigcanapari.com/too-much-homework-too-little-sleep-structural-sleep-deprivation-in-teens/
attributes.background: Require all schools to start at 10:00 AM

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612113
